creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: constructed like an apron; larger unlined part has center embroidered section of squares with geometric centers; borders of plain and embroidered strips on 3 sides; 2 corners have layered squares with embroidered center and corner loops; smaller lined part has small embroidered geometric hexagons; red, tan, black, grey; uncut threads on back of large part; cut ties on both parts
title: Baby Carrier
